entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Estevan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:28 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Airport 3:51 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: E 35 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing this evening and ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 this evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
